sentences.sContent: The jewels were locked away inside the safe.
I sent the money inside an envelope addressed to Ann.
sentences.sCn: 我把钱装在写有安的名字和地址的信封内寄出。

sentences.sContent: Carl picked up the book and stuffed it inside his jacket.
sentences.sCn: 卡尔把书捡起来塞进自己的夹克里。

sentences.sContent: Her car was locked and the keys were inside.
sentences.sCn: 她的车锁上了，钥匙在车里。

phrases.pCn: adv. 在里面；在内心；知道内情

words.tran: 内部的人，会员；熟悉内情者

trans.tranOther: in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
in or facing the inner part of something
the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part
